# 配置文件
```ini
; Script generated by the Inno Setup Script Wizard.
; SEE THE DOCUMENTATION FOR DETAILS ON CREATING INNO SETUP SCRIPT FILES!

#define MyAppName "VideoDown"
#define MyAppVersion "1.0"
#define MyAppExeName "main.exe"
#define MyAppAssocName MyAppName + ""
#define MyAppAssocExt ".exe"
#define MyAppAssocKey StringChange(MyAppAssocName, " ", "") + MyAppAssocExt

[Setup]
; NOTE: The value of AppId uniquely identifies this application. Do not use the same AppId value in installers for other applications.
; (To generate a new GUID, click Tools | Generate GUID inside the IDE.)
AppId={{95FDC28E-EDE9-4F55-BDA3-E33500E8A431}
AppName={#MyAppName}
AppVersion={#MyAppVersion}
;AppVerName={#MyAppName} {#MyAppVersion}
DefaultDirName={autopf}\{#MyAppName}
ChangesAssociations=yes
DisableProgramGroupPage=yes
; Remove the following line to run in administrative install mode (install for all users.)
PrivilegesRequired=lowest
OutputDir=E:\Download_DL\downloader\downloader_dl\other\build
OutputBaseFilename=VideoDown
SetupIconFile=E:\Download_DL\downloader\downloader_dl\other\build\main.dist\static\images\icon.ico
Compression=lzma
SolidCompression=yes
WizardStyle=modern

[Languages]
Name: "english"; MessagesFile: "compiler:Default.isl"

[Tasks]
Name: "desktopicon"; Description: "{cm:CreateDesktopIcon}"; GroupDescription: "{cm:AdditionalIcons}"; Flags: unchecked

[Files]
Source: "E:\Download_DL\downloader\downloader_dl\other\build\main.dist\{#MyAppExeName}"; DestDir: "{app}"; Flags: ignoreversion
Source: "E:\Download_DL\downloader\downloader_dl\other\build\main.dist\*"; DestDir: "{app}"; Flags: ignoreversion recursesubdirs createallsubdirs  ; 
; NOTE: Don't use "Flags: ignoreversion" on any shared system files

[Types]
Name: install site package ;Description:"install site package"; Flags: iscustom


[Registry]
Root: HKA; Subkey: "Software\Classes\{#MyAppAssocExt}\OpenWithProgids"; ValueType: string; ValueName: "{#MyAppAssocKey}"; ValueData: ""; Flags: uninsdeletevalue
Root: HKA; Subkey: "Software\Classes\{#MyAppAssocKey}"; ValueType: string; ValueName: ""; ValueData: "{#MyAppAssocName}"; Flags: uninsdeletekey
Root: HKA; Subkey: "Software\Classes\{#MyAppAssocKey}\DefaultIcon"; ValueType: string; ValueName: ""; ValueData: "{app}\{#MyAppExeName},0"
Root: HKA; Subkey: "Software\Classes\{#MyAppAssocKey}\shell\open\command"; ValueType: string; ValueName: ""; ValueData: """{app}\{#MyAppExeName}"" ""%1"""
Root: HKA; Subkey: "Software\Classes\Applications\{#MyAppExeName}\SupportedTypes"; ValueType: string; ValueName: ".myp"; ValueData: ""

[Icons]
Name: "{autoprograms}\{#MyAppName}"; Filename: "{app}\{#MyAppExeName}"
Name: "{autodesktop}\{#MyAppName}"; Filename: "{app}\{#MyAppExeName}"; Tasks: desktopicon

[Code]
procedure SetProgressBarMax(Ratio: Integer);
begin
  WizardForm.ProgressGauge.Max := WizardForm.ProgressGauge.Max * Ratio;
end;
 
procedure UpdateProgressBar(Position: Integer);
begin
  WizardForm.ProgressGauge.Position := Position * WizardForm.ProgressGauge.Max div 100;
end;



[Run]
Filename: "{app}\{#MyAppExeName}"; Description: "{cm:LaunchProgram,{#StringChange(MyAppName, '&', '&&')}}"; Flags: nowait postinstall skipifsilent; BeforeInstall:SetProgressBarMax(200);
Filename: "{app}\static\install_packge.bat";  StatusMsg: "Don't worry, just wait a minute"; Flags: skipifsilent runhidden; BeforeInstall: UpdateProgressbar(90); AfterInstall: UpdateProgressBar(200); 


```
